about.title: About Me and What I Do
about.description: I'm {name}, an 18-year-old who loves challenges and lives to grow. I've spent over 2.5 years in calisthenics, where I built both physical and mental strength, and 1.5+ years in web development, where I found a creative way to express ideas and create something meaningful. I recently launched my professional website to start my own business — one that combines my passion for fitness, tech, and helping others. My mission is to create content, tools, and opportunities that will not only inspire, but have people push past their limits, just like I try to do every day.

goals.title: My Vision (Long Term)
goals.intro: I have complex goals — and I know they sound ambitious. I want to:
goals.goal1: Build a platform that gives real recognition to overlooked people: firefighters, soldiers, athletes, construction workers.
goals.goals2: Help shift how people see sports and physical discipline, showing it's more than just a hobby — it's a powerful career path.
goals.goals3: Remove financial barriers, so that discipline driven and talented people can reach development, no matter their background.
goals.transition1: But I also know that none of that can happen without
goals.currentActions1: Creating content to grow my audience on social media.
goals.currentActions2: Practicing web development, making this website even more accessible.
goals.currentActions3: Writing consistent blogs to document my journey in communication and self-expression.
goals.currentActions4: Training mindfully in calisthenics to live the values I talk about.
goals.conclusion: My ambitions are complex — but I'm building the skills, mindset, and tools to reach them step by step.

qualities.title: Core Qualities
qualities.description1: I don't quit. I aim high - sometimes near impossibility - because
qualities.challange: I enjoy the challenge of chasing results
qualities.description2: . I don't pretend to have all the answers, but I do show up every day, ready to learn, improve, and take the next step.
